title: #222/New Palm Springs Modernism:  Architect Sean Lockyer + Comedian Aaron Kominos-Smith
description: Architects like Chambers, Clark, Cody, Frey, Kaptur, Krisel, Wexler, and Williams put the Modernist architecture of Palm Springs on the map from the 1940’s through the 2000’s, and in Hugh Kaptur’s case, still going at age 90.  Behind them are a new generation of Modernist architects and today we talk with one of the area’s most successful, Sean Lockyer.  Later on, comedian and former architecture student Aaron Kominos Smith.
